tool_description:
Get Chinese newest citys data.
Accuracy level: province, city ,distrct and  street.
The data includes: the name of the province, city, distrct,and street, latitude and longitude, zip code, area code
name: Chinese newest citys data
title: Chinese newest citys data

api_list.name: search_info
api_list.description:
The data includes: the name of the province, city, and street, latitude and longitude, postcode, area code.
The level can control the accuracy range of data query, the optional values are: province, city, district, street,default value is 'city'. The range increases step by step.
**Query keyword must be in Chinese**
